name: Elemental Parasite
description:
You are a Parasite that infects Elemental beings.

When your host is destroyed by an Element you are weak to, that Elemental will then be then Infected.

How to play:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim and shoot
  • E to pause
  • F to toggle fullscreen

Music used: https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action

(Note: Mac version is untested)

Made in under a week for Godot Wild Jam #32, with the theme "Seven"

6 varieties of Elemental + 1 parasite = 7
